page.title: 05ODCOMBE GIRL GUIDES.
page.content: The{GIRL GUIDE COMPANY}at Odcombe was started in January 1984. As far as I know this is the first time there has been a company in the village. Our numbers vary from 15_25 and at present there are 16 guides. The company serves{Odcombe,Montacute, Stoke-sub- {Hamdon}and{West Coker}but the majority of the girls are from Odcombe.The leaders have always been from outside the village. The{Guide}programme includes service to{GOD}and the community,{self_discipline,}and self reliance, fitness, home_craft and knowledge of the living world, the arts and mankind. We attend church regularly at Odcombe. We also learn about living out of doors and camping. Ten of the{Guides }will attend an international camp at Cheddar in July, which will be in celebration of {seventy five years}of Guiding.
